TopicTitle: The most Kerbal game since KSP.

Articles.Content:
http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/659943965/planetary-annihilation-a-next-generation-rts

Watch the video at the top of the page and try to tell me the space things are not something Kerbals would think of, if not necessarily use as shown.

And donate! If we get to 1,800 K they will give us galactic battles!

Looks like spore with a proper civilization/space stage. Awesome!

Not really me kind of kerbal though (designing ships etc) but it's still neat. I hope the orbiting is manual.
